attributes.action: Ask the UK government to reconsider new hate crime proposals.
attributes.additional_details: Death threats and incitement to violence are already clearly defined in law there is no need for any additional measures.
attributes.background:
We call on the UK government to reconsider new hate crime proposals as it is against freedom of speech crucial to our democracy. A 'hate crime' could be interpreted as literally anything.

Police should be working on the ground protecting the public not wasting valuable time on social media.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We aren't sure which new hate crime proposals you mean. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
